wikipedia_page.main: Rear-Admiral Robert Archibald James Montgomerie,  (11 September 1855 – 1 September 1908) was a British Royal Navy officer, who received the Albert Medal for Lifesaving.

response: Bonaventure served  in the Pacific Squadron, including service in the 3rd China War, under command of Captain Robert Montgomerie RN.Robert Archibald Montgomerie Service record, The National Archives, ADM 196/19
